SELECT VISIT_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO VISITOR ( VT_NO, VT_CONTENT, VT_WRITER, VT_PASS, VT_IP, VT_DATE, VT_IMG ) VALUES ( #{vt_no}, #{vt_content}, #{vt_writer}, #{vt_pass}, #{vt_ip}, sysdate, #{vt_img,jdbcType=BLOB} )

SELECT VREP_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO vpds ( VPDS_NO, VT_NO, VPDS_FILENAME, VPDS_SAVENAME, VPDS_MIME, VPDS_SIZE, VPDS_FANCYSIZE ) VALUES ( #{vpds_no}, #{vt_no}, #{vpds_filename}, #{vpds_savename}, #{vpds_mime}, #{vpds_size}, #{vpds_fancysize} )
mapper.select: select B.* from ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT VISITOR.VT_NO, VT_CONTENT, VT_WRITER, VT_PASS, VT_IP, TO_CHAR(VT_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') vt_date, VT_IMG, REP_NO, REP_CONTENT, REP_WRITER, TO_CHAR(REP_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') rep_date FROM VISITOR LEFT OUTER JOIN VISITREPLY ON (VISITOR.VT_NO = VISITREPLY.VT_NO) ORDER BY VISITOR.VT_NO DESC ) A ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
